title: Font used for logo OUR LEGACY
content:
Hi everyone,

Can anybody help me to find this font ?

The closest I've found is Heltar : [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/northernblock/heltar/](http://web.archive.org/web/20140829171153/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/northernblock/heltar/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/northernblock/heltar/")

[http://www.ourlegacy.se/](http://web.archive.org/web/20140829171153/http:/www.ourlegacy.se/ "http://www.ourlegacy.se/")

Thanks in advance !

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140829171153im_/http:/typophile.com/files/859112_689850961042775_1125193921_o_4667.png)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [859112\_689850961042775\_1125193921\_o.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20140829171153/http:/typophile.com/files/859112_689850961042775_1125193921_o.png) | 35.62 KB |
author: Alphonse

comments.content:
I'm probably wrong but to me, somebody played with [Arial](http://web.archive.org/web/20140829171153/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/mti/arial) (mainly with /G actually)...  
Alternatives: [Aaux Next Wide](http://web.archive.org/web/20140829171153/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/positype/aaux-next-wide), [Union RP](http://web.archive.org/web/20140829171153/http:/www.radimpesko.com/fonts/union)
